column.name: SPBPERS_SSN
column.comment: This field maintains person social security number.

column.name: SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE
column.comment: This field maintains person birth date.

column.name: SPBPERS_LGCY_CODE
column.comment: This field maintains legacy code associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_ETHN_CODE
column.comment: ETHNIC CODE: This field identifies the ethnic code referenced on the General Person Form (SPAPERS) and by the Source/Base Institution Year Form (SOABGIY). The code is mapped to other codes which are required for government reporting.

column.name: SPBPERS_MRTL_CODE
column.comment: This field maintains martial status associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_RELG_CODE
column.comment: This field maintains religious affiliation associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_SEX
column.comment: This field maintains the sex of person. Valid values are: M - Male, F - Female, N - Unknown.

column.name: SPBPERS_CONFID_IND
column.comment: This field identifies if a person record is confidential Valid value is: Y - confidential.

column.name: SPBPERS_DEAD_IND
column.comment: This field indicates if a person is deceased. Valid value is: Y - deceased.

column.name: SPBPERS_VETC_FILE_NUMBER
column.comment: This field maintains veteran identification number associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_LEGAL_NAME
column.comment: This field maintains legal name associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_PREF_FIRST_NAME
column.comment: This field maintains the preferred first name associated with person.

column.name: SPBPERS_NAME_PREFIX
column.comment: This field maintains the prefix (Mr, Mrs, etc) used before person name.

column.name: SPBPERS_NAME_SUFFIX
column.comment: This field maintains the suffix (Jr, Sr, etc) used after person name.

column.name: SPBPERS_ACTIVITY_DATE
column.comment: This field defines the most current date a record is added or changed.

column.name: SPBPERS_VERA_IND
column.comment: Veteran Category. None, (O)ther Protected Veteran Only, (V)ietnam Veteran only, (B)oth Vietnam and Other Eligible Veteran.

column.name: SPBPERS_CITZ_IND
column.comment: Citizen Indicator.

column.name: SPBPERS_DEAD_DATE
column.comment: Person Deceased Date.

column.name: SPBPERS_PIN
column.comment: Person Identification Number. This column is obsolete, now gobtpac_pin

column.name: SPBPERS_CITZ_CODE
column.comment: Person Citizen Type

column.name: SPBPERS_HAIR_CODE
column.comment: The hair color of the person being defined.

column.name: SPBPERS_EYES_CODE
column.comment: The eye color of the person being defined.

column.name: SPBPERS_CITY_BIRTH
column.comment: The city where the person was born.

column.name: SPBPERS_STAT_CODE_BIRTH
column.comment: The state in which the person was born.

column.name: SPBPERS_DRIVER_LICENSE
column.comment: The Driver License Number as it appears on the actual license.

column.name: SPBPERS_STAT_CODE_DRIVER
column.comment: The State code describing the state the driver license was issued.

column.name: SPBPERS_NATN_CODE_DRIVER
column.comment: The Nation code associated with the Nation the Driver license was issued.

column.name: SPBPERS_UOMS_CODE_HEIGHT
column.comment: The Unit of Measure describing the height value.

column.name: SPBPERS_HEIGHT
column.comment: The number value describing the height of the person.

column.name: SPBPERS_UOMS_CODE_WEIGHT
column.comment: The Unit of Measure describing the weight value.

column.name: SPBPERS_WEIGHT
column.comment: The number value describing the weight of the person.

column.name: SPBPERS_SDVET_IND
column.comment: Indicator to identify an individual as a special disabled veteran.

column.name: SPBPERS_LICENSE_ISSUED_DATE
column.comment: The issue date of the individuals driver license.

column.name: SPBPERS_LICENSE_EXPIRES_DATE
column.comment: The expiration date of the individuals driver license.

column.name: SPBPERS_INCAR_IND
column.comment: The indication of the individuals incarceration.

column.name: SPBPERS_WEBID
column.comment: Web identification session token is now obsolete.

column.name: SPBPERS_WEB_LAST_ACCESS
column.comment: Web last access time stamp is now obsolete.

column.name: SPBPERS_PIN_DISABLED_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether or not the PIN number is disabled. This column is obsolete, now gobtpac_pin_disabled_ind

column.name: SPBPERS_ITIN
column.comment: The international tax id number.

column.name: SPBPERS_ACTIVE_DUTY_SEPR_DATE
column.comment: Active Duty Separation Date: The Date that the person was separated from active duty.

column.name: SPBPERS_DATA_ORIGIN
column.comment: DATA ORIGIN: Source system that created or updated the row

column.name: SPBPERS_USER_ID
column.comment: USER ID: User who inserted or last update the data

column.name: SPBPERS_ETHN_CDE
column.comment: ETHNIC CODE: This field identifies the ethnic code defined by the U.S. government. The valid values are 1 - Not Hispanic or Latino, 2 - Hispanic or Latino, or null.

column.name: SPBPERS_CONFIRMED_RE_CDE
column.comment: RACE AND ETHNICITY CONFIRMED: This field identifies the race and ethnicity has been confirmed. Valid values are (Y)es, (N)o and Null.

column.name: SPBPERS_CONFIRMED_RE_DATE
column.comment: RACE AND ETHNICITY CONFIRMED DATE: This field identifies when the race and ethnicity has been confirmed.
